recipes.name: Oil and Garlic Linguine
recipes.directions: boil linguine, saute sliced garlic, toast red pepper flakes in with the garlic, add cooked pasta, quarter cup of pasta water, lemon and parsley to the sauted garlic and pepper flakes. Salt to taste.
recipes.ingredients:
linguine
olive oil
garlic
parsely
lemon
red pepper

recipes.name: Mashed Yellow Potatoes
recipes.directions: boil potatoes in salty water until soft. Drain, add milk and oil. Salt to taste
recipes.ingredients:
yellow potatoes
milk of your choice, olive oil

recipes.name: Green juice
recipes.directions: Combine ingredients and blend until it has the consistancy of juice
recipes.ingredients: kale, flax seeds, dates, almonds, ice
